column1: echo ¦echo¦"[mail function]" >> /usr/local/etc/php/php.ini && echo "sendmail_path = /usr/sbin/ssmtp -t" >> /usr/local/etc/php/php.ini && apache2ctl restart :: Filesystem_operation
